name: Otdyhnamore
overview:
Key idea of our project transform Otdyhnamore site to socially oriented self-organisen (autometed formed Community + FAQ in tourism) Web-based platform where they can interact with clients, landlords and associated services.

The idea of ​​the portal (platform) to gather all information with regards to recreation (accommodation to rent reviews, rested, far better to go? Where to go? How to use the service) in one place. Entry Point: home owners (landlords), customers (who want to book accommodation) related services (transfers, tours, tickets reservation, the poster measures for institutions - theaters, clubs, bars, restaurants, etc.) with the possibility of a joint communication to the interests of . The interest of LandLords - pass housing for rent; Customer interest - to find suitable accommodation, plan your vacation (cultural - “where to go?” And costly part - “what you need for this money?”), Book associated services (transfers, tours, tickets, etc.); Interest partners (service) - to promote and sell their services to those in need at the moment.

Our platform helps keep interested parties THREE! And allows them to productively interact with each other. All eventually get what they are looking for! This Web-based platform to an existing project Otdyhnamore - a site where visitors can book a favorite item and find more information with regards to vacation in the Crimea.

Why you should give money to us?

  • we team of professionals
  • our project occupated huge nishe (Russian travel)
  • online booking (private housing) in Russia represent low quantity and lowest quality small compalies (located in just one city)
  • clear perspectives + strategic plans

Tnx for your attention. Graetings! CEO& co-founder of Otdyhnamore co. Alex Yerokhin (sas4us)
